lessons.japanese: 彼の本は田園生活の話から始まる。
lessons.indonesian: His book begins with a tale of country life.

lessons.japanese: 都市化が田園生活をどんどん侵食しています。
lessons.indonesian: Urbanization is encroaching on rural life.

lessons.japanese: 都会生活と田園生活とは対照的な相違がある。
lessons.indonesian: There is a great contrast between city life and country life.

lessons.japanese: 都会に住んでいる人々は田園生活の楽しみを知らない。
lessons.indonesian: People living in town don't know the pleasures of country life.

lessons.japanese: 田園生活は都会生活よりいくつかの点で優れている、と私は思う。
lessons.indonesian: I think country life is superior to city life in some respects.

lessons.japanese: 田園を歩くのは楽しいと思った。
lessons.indonesian: I found it pleasant walking in the country.

lessons.japanese: 神は田園を作り、人は都会を作った。
lessons.indonesian: God made the country and man made the town.

lessons.japanese: 神は田園を作り、人は都会を作った。
lessons.indonesian: God made the country and man made the town.

lessons.japanese: 田園を歩くのは楽しいと思った。
lessons.indonesian: I found it pleasant walking in the country.

lessons.japanese: 田園生活は都会生活よりいくつかの点で優れている、と私は思う。
lessons.indonesian: I think country life is superior to city life in some respects.

lessons.japanese: 都会に住んでいる人々は田園生活の楽しみを知らない。
lessons.indonesian: People living in town don't know the pleasures of country life.

lessons.japanese: 都会生活と田園生活とは対照的な相違がある。
lessons.indonesian: There is a great contrast between city life and country life.

lessons.japanese: 都市化が田園生活をどんどん侵食しています。
lessons.indonesian: Urbanization is encroaching on rural life.

lessons.japanese: 彼の本は田園生活の話から始まる。
lessons.indonesian: His book begins with a tale of country life.
